title: Starcraft with BroodWar addon for Linux
description:
Name: Starcraft with BroodWar addon
Producer: Blizzard Entertainment
Year: 1998-1999
Site of the game: www.blizzard.com/starcraft/
Genre: Real-time strategy
Language: English

The game is in ready to play format for Linux (using wine):
* The game is installed in the directory starcraft_broodwar/.wine
  This way your default .wine directory would not be affected
* Installed add-on Broodwar (adds new units and maps)
* Installed program that disables CDROM check
* Added launch shell script (PlayStarCraft.sh)
* Added desktop launcher for gnome desktop with an icon
